name: SpotLights
shortDescription: This light gets emitted from a single point in one direction, along a cone that increases in size the further from the light it gets.
description: This light gets emitted from a single point in one direction, along a cone that increases in size the further from the light it gets.

eventsFunctions.description: Create a spot light.
eventsFunctions.name: CreateSpotLight
eventsFunctions.sentence: Create spot light _PARAM1_, color: _PARAM2_, intensity: _PARAM3_, distance: _PARAM4_, decay: _PARAM5_, angle: _PARAM6_, penumbra: _PARAM7_, cast shadow: _PARAM9_, auto update: _PARAM10_, shadow map size: _PARAM11_, position X: _PARAM12_, Y: _PARAM13_, Z: _PARAM14_, target position X: _PARAM15_, Y: _PARAM16_, Z: _PARAM17_

inlineCode: const spotLight = new THREE.SpotLight("rgb(" + rgbColorGD[0] + ", " + rgbColorGD[1] + ", " + rgbColorGD[2] + ")");

parameters.description: Distance, maximum range of the light (default is 0 no limit)
parameters.name: Distance

parameters.description: Decay, the amount the light dims along the distance of the light (default is 2)
parameters.name: Decay

parameters.description: Angle, maximum angle of light dispersion
parameters.name: Angle

parameters.description: Penumbra, percent of the spotlight cone that is attenuated due to penumbra takes values between zero and 1 (default is zero)
parameters.name: Penumbra

parameters.description: Texture, used to modulate the color of the light (is disabled if cast shadow is false)
parameters.name: Texture

parameters.description: Enable automatic updates of the light's shadow, if you do not require dynamic lighting set this to false
parameters.name: AutoUpdate

eventsFunctions.description: Delete a spot light.
eventsFunctions.name: DeleteSpotLight

eventsFunctions.description: Shadow maps for a spot light will be updated in the next render call (for use with a none dynamic spot light).
eventsFunctions.name: SetNeedsUpdate

eventsFunctions.description: Change the color of a spot light.
eventsFunctions.name: SetColor

eventsFunctions.description: The color of a spot light.
eventsFunctions.name: Color

eventsFunctions.description: the intensity of a spot light.
eventsFunctions.name: Intensity

eventsFunctions.description: Point light distance.
eventsFunctions.name: SetDistance

eventsFunctions.description: the distance of a spot light.
eventsFunctions.name: Distance

eventsFunctions.description: Point light decay.
eventsFunctions.name: SetDecay

eventsFunctions.description: the decay of a spot light.
eventsFunctions.name: Decay

eventsFunctions.description: Point light decay.
eventsFunctions.name: SetShadowBias

eventsFunctions.description:
the shadow bias of a spot light, how much to add or subtract from the normalized depth when deciding whether a surface is in shadow.
The default is 0. Very tiny adjustments here (in the order of 0.0001) may help reduce artifacts in shadows
eventsFunctions.name: ShadowBias

eventsFunctions.description: Point light decay.
eventsFunctions.name: SetBlurSamples

eventsFunctions.description: The amount of samples to use when blurring a VSM shadow map.
eventsFunctions.name: BlurSamples

eventsFunctions.description: Point light decay.
eventsFunctions.name: SetShadowFocus

eventsFunctions.description: Used to focus the shadow camera, the camera's field of view is set as a percentage of the spotlight's field-of-view, (Range is 0 to 1 Default is 1.0).
eventsFunctions.name: ShadowFocus

eventsFunctions.description: Point light decay.
eventsFunctions.name: SetShadowNormalBias

eventsFunctions.description: the shadow normal bias of a spot light, how much the position used to query the shadow map is offset along the object normal. The default is 0. Increasing this value can be used to reduce shadow acne especially in large scenes where light shines onto geometry at a shallow angle. The cost is that shadows may appear distorted.
eventsFunctions.name: ShadowNormalBias

eventsFunctions.description: Point light decay.
eventsFunctions.name: SetShadowRadius

eventsFunctions.description: the shadow radius of a spot light, values greater than 1 will blur the edges of the shadow. High values will cause unwanted banding effects in the shadows - a greater mapSize will allow for a higher value to be used here before these effects become visible. If WebGLRenderer.shadowMap.type is set to PCFSoftShadowMap, radius has no effect and it is recommended to increase softness by decreasing mapSize instead.
eventsFunctions.name: ShadowRadius

eventsFunctions.description: Enable or disable spot light casting shadows.
eventsFunctions.name: SetCastShadow

eventsFunctions.description: The cast shadow of a spot light.
eventsFunctions.name: CastShadow
eventsFunctions.sentence: the cast shadow of _PARAM1_ spot light

eventsFunctions.description: Change the position of a spot light.
eventsFunctions.name: SetPosition
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the position of _PARAM1_ to X: _PARAM2_, Y: _PARAM3_, Z: _PARAM4_

eventsFunctions.description: Change the target position of a spot light.
eventsFunctions.name: SetTargetPosition
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the target position of _PARAM1_ to X: _PARAM2_, Y: _PARAM3_, Z: _PARAM4_

eventsFunctions.description: Change the X position of a point light.
eventsFunctions.name: SetPositionX
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change point light _PARAM1_ X position to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Change the X position of a point light.
eventsFunctions.name: SetTargetPositionX
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change point light _PARAM1_ X position to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Change the Y position of a point light.
eventsFunctions.name: SetPositionY
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change point light _PARAM1_ Y position to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Change the Y position of a point light.
eventsFunctions.name: SetTargetPositionY
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change point light _PARAM1_ Y position to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Change the Z position of a point light.
eventsFunctions.name: SetPositionZ
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change point light _PARAM1_ Z position to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Change the Z position of a point light.
eventsFunctions.name: SetTargetPositionZ
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change point light _PARAM1_ Z position to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: the X position of spot light.
eventsFunctions.name: PositionX

eventsFunctions.description: the X position of spot light target.
eventsFunctions.name: TargetPositionX
eventsFunctions.sentence: the X position of _PARAM1_ spot light target

eventsFunctions.description: the Y position of spot light.
eventsFunctions.name: PositionY

eventsFunctions.description: the Y position of spot light target.
eventsFunctions.name: TargetPositionY
eventsFunctions.sentence: the Y position of _PARAM1_ spot light target

eventsFunctions.description: the Z position of spot light.
eventsFunctions.name: PositionZ

eventsFunctions.description: the Z position of spot light target.
eventsFunctions.name: TargetPositionZ
eventsFunctions.sentence: the Z position of _PARAM1_ spot light target

eventsFunctions.description: Change the shadow map size of a spot light.
eventsFunctions.name: SetShadowMapSize
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the shadow map size of _PARAM1_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: The distance to the near clipping plane of the shadow camera, objects closer to the light source than this distance will not contribute to the shadow map.
eventsFunctions.name: SetShadowCameraNear
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the shadow camera near of _PARAM1_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: The distance to the far clipping plane of the shadow camera, objects farther away from the light source than this distance will not contribute to the shadow map.
eventsFunctions.name: SetShadowCameraFar
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the shadow camera far of _PARAM1_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Enables or disables automatic updates of the light's shadow, if you do not require dynamic lighting set this to false.
eventsFunctions.name: SetDynamicLight
